info.description: This is a wallet service API for managing user accounts, assets, and transactions
info.title: Wallet Service API

get.description: Get all accounts for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new account for the authenticated user

get.description: Filter accounts with optional parameters for the authenticated user
Get summary statistics for all user accounts
Get all accounts of a specific type for the authenticated user
Get all accounts with their assets for the authenticated user
get.summary: Get all user accounts with assets

get.description: Get a specific account by ID for the authenticated user

put.description: Update an existing account for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete an existing account for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a specific account by ID with its assets for the authenticated user
get.summary: Get account by ID with assets

get.description: Get all assets for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new asset for the authenticated user

get.description: Filter assets with optional parameters for the authenticated user
Get a specific asset by ID for the authenticated user

put.description: Update an existing asset for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete an existing asset for the authenticated user

post.description: Login user with email and password
Register a new user with email and password

get.description: Get all asset definitions with optional pagination
Search asset definitions by name or abbreviation
Get a specific asset definition by ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
